title: Introduction to Emotional Intelligence
description: Discover the fundamentals of understanding and managing your emotions

modules.title: Your First Steps to Emotional Mastery

questions.question: What are the core components of emotional intelligence?
options: Self-awareness, self-regulation, empathy, and social skills

questions.question: Why is recognizing emotions important?
options: So you can suppress them more effectively
Because you can't manage what you don't notice

subtitle: Feel more, understand better
